name: FANS: Five Nights at Spencerport
description:
Fnaf clone I made because I was bored. Based off of a true story.

It will trigger a virus warning on both Mac and Windows. On windows you just have to press more info and say run anyway. Mac you have to right click the file and press open, it should work that way. If you are reinstalling this after an update, your data will save, you should just delete the other one.

V 1.1: added clear indicator of what night you are on. Made it automatically go to next night after winning because it wasn't clear that there was more to the game.
